pageContext.description: Dimensions: L 237mm; Wbl. 45.2mm; Wm 28.5mm; Bm 29.3mm; Ds 205mm; Wt. 242.7 g,Typology: rounded midrib, fillet defined, but all merging at tip; fillet disappear at about blade base but have no defined line here; socket appears to broaden a little into blade wings.,Manufacture: good concave edge-bevel; some asymmetry in midrib cross-section possibly betraying valve dislocation in casting.,Condition: few dents.notches in blade edge - rest very slightly serrated all round; possibly slight distortion of socket mouth.
pageContext.surface: Patchy areas of dk. green-brown smooth surface - possibly patina remnants; mostly varied gold to light green with much pocking - possibly some cleaning since discovery.
pageContext.collection: London, British Museum, P1981.1-1.1,Purchased from Mr. R. C. Long, 141 Bedfont Lane, Feltham, Middlesex
